name: Leather Die - 3D - (Skull & Crossbones II)
title: Leather Die - 3D - (Skull & Crossbones II) | KnifeKits.com
keywords: leather stamp die, leather tooling die, leather, sheath, setter, punch, Skull, Crossbones, Skull & Crossbones
description: This is a 3D "Skull & Crossbones II" die, used for embossing leather projects. This tool is high quality and will last for many years.
To use, snap the 3D die on the available stamp handle and hammer the end to create the embossed design.
Stamp Handle and dies shown in sample images below are for examples only. Stamp handle is sold separately.

name: Wooden Mallet - (4 inch Head)
title: Wooden Mallet - (4 inch Head) | KnifeKits.com
keywords: mallet, leather stamp die, leather tooling die, leather, sheath, setter, punch, hammer
description: This is a wooden mallet used for hammering surfaces where you want to avoid scratching. It is also excellent for hammering the 3D dies used in leather tooling stamps.

name: Leather Cord :: Lace - (0.125 width) - White
title: Leather Cord :: Lace - (0.125 width) - White | KnifeKits.com
description: Our premium leather lace cord is designed for high-end lanyard design. This 1/8" lace cord can be used for many purposes, but is commonly tied in various braided lanyards. Premium leather lace cord is typically used with upscale findings, such as pewter, sterling, gemstones and gold beads, etc.
Additional images below are for reference only. Please refer to color above for product color.

name: Stamp Handle - Spring Loaded - (for 3D Stamping Dies)
title: Stamp Handle - Spring Loaded - (for 3D Stamping Dies) | KnifeKits.com
keywords: stamp handle, leather tooling die, leather, sheath, setter, punch
description: Our spring loaded stamp handle is designed to fit the 3D dies used to embellish leather projects. This model is 4" long and has a non-slip textured surface on the shaft for easy handling. To use, snap the 3D die of your choice on the end and hammer the end of the handle to create the embossed design.
This tool is high quality and will last for many years.
3D dies shown in sample images below are sold separately.

name: Punch Set - Small - (5/64 to 11/64) - (8pc)
title: Punch Set - Small - (5/64 to 11/64) - (8pc) | KnifeKits.com
keywords: kydex hole punch, cutter, punch set, hole punch, hole cutter
description: This is a great tool to have for cleanly and accurately punching small diameter holes in leather, KYDEX®, HOLSTEX®, Spacer material and much more. Made with a hardened, threaded handle, each punch cutter can be quickly changed out for a precise hole cut. Used for adding button snaps, chicago screws, mounting posts or clearing a spacer hole for pins, hidden bolt fasteners, corby rivets and thong hole tubing.
as a cutting base for this product.

name: Combo Kit - CKK Eyelet/Snap Setting System - (Master Series)
title: Combo Kit - CKK Eyelet/Snap Setting System - (Master Series) | KnifeKits.com
keywords: kydex eyelet, kydex rivet, line 20, line 24, snaps, flaring, die, KYDEX, sheath, holster, gun, knife, boltaron, holstex, leather
description: This Master Series combo set includes male and female dies for flaring #6 and #8 eyelets, as well as male and female dies for setting Line-20 and Line-24 snaps, all commonly used in knife sheath and gun holster making. These are professional grade and value priced for serious hobbyists.

Our Master Series eyelet flaring combo set is designed to professionally "roll" the unflared side of #6 and #8 holster eyelets by using our Pro Flaring Press (included). The CKK Master Series die system is the industry standard for KYDEX®, HOLSTEX® and BOLTARON® eyelet press-flaring and is used by professionals who make thousands of holsters and sheaths.

Our Master Series snap setters are designed to professionally affix 2-part Line-20 and Line-24 snaps to leather, cloth, rubber and most other materials. These come as a 2-part male/female system and are heat treated for super long life.
#6 eyelets require a .187 inch hole (3/16) drilled in the thermoplastic sheet or leather for fastening.
#8 eyelets require a .250 inch hole (1/4) drilled in the thermoplastic sheet or leather for fastening.
Included in Master Die Combo Kit
Line-20 Dies = for Line-20 snap sets
Line-24 Dies = for Line-24 snap sets
Pro Flaring Press = For male/female dies
Heat treated dies (for maximum wear resistance)
Pre-rolled eyelets/Pre-set snaps and finished leather straps and holsters shown below are for demo purposes only and are not included in combo die set.

name: Tap/Drill - Combo Set - 8-32UNF
title: Tap/Drill - Combo Set - 8-32UNF | KnifeKits.com
keywords: tap, drill, 8-32, torx, knife, gun, precision, micro, fastener, hss, threading, tap and drill combo, combo sets, knifekits.com
description: This tap and drill combo set is designed to create the pilot hole and precision thread necessary to accept a precision 8-32UNF screw. These tap and drill set are commonly used in knife and gun making. Our drills and taps are designed to work in combination to create the best thread result possible.
Each tap and drill combo set comes packed in a dual-compartment, locking combo case. This insures that storage is organized and the cutting surfaces are protected.

name: Combo Kit - CKK Eyelet/Snap Setting System - (Journeyman Series)
title: Combo Kit - CKK Eyelet/Snap Setting System - (Journeyman Series) | KnifeKits.com
keywords: journeyman kydex eyelet flaring, rivet, line 20, line 24, snaps, flaring, die, KYDEX, sheath, holster, gun, knife, boltaron, holstex, leather
description: This combo set includes male and female dies for flaring #6 and #8 eyelets, as well as male and female dies for setting Line-20 and Line-24 snaps, all commonly used in knife sheath and gun holster making. These are professional grade and value priced for serious hobbyists.

Our Journeyman Series eyelet flaring combo set is designed to professionally "roll" the unflared side of #6 and #8 holster eyelets by using a small hammer with our die guide. The CKK Journeyman die system is the industry standard for KYDEX®, HOLSTEX® and BOLTARON® eyelet hammer-flaring and is used by professionals who make thousands of holsters and sheaths.

Our Journeyman Series snap setters are designed to professionally affix 2-part Line-20 and Line-24 snaps to leather, cloth, rubber and most other materials. These come as a 2-part male/female system and are heat treated for super long life.
#6 eyelets require a .187 inch hole (3/16) drilled in the thermoplastic sheet or leather for fastening.
#8 eyelets require a .250 inch hole (1/4) drilled in the thermoplastic sheet or leather for fastening.
Included in Journeyman Die Combo Kit
Line-20 Dies = for Line-20 snap sets
Line-24 Dies = for Line-24 snap sets
Die Guide = For holding male/female dies
Die Guide made in the USA at CKK Industries
Pre-rolled eyelets/Pre-set snaps and finished leather straps and holsters shown below are for demo purposes only and are not included in combo die set.
